data.name: 3DMark Demo
data.detailed_description: Test your PC with the world's most popular benchmarking app. The 3DMark demo includes the Steel Nomad, Steel Nomad Light, Solar Bay, Solar Bay Extreme, Time Spy, and Fire Strike benchmarks. Test your PC, then compare scores with your friends on Steam.
data.about_the_game: Test your PC with the world's most popular benchmarking app. The 3DMark demo includes the Steel Nomad, Steel Nomad Light, Solar Bay, Solar Bay Extreme, Time Spy, and Fire Strike benchmarks. Test your PC, then compare scores with your friends on Steam.
data.short_description: Test your PC with the world's most popular benchmarking app. The 3DMark demo includes the Steel Nomad, Steel Nomad Light, Time Spy, and Fire Strike benchmarks. Test your PC then compare scores with your friends on Steam.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Windows Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista*
  • Processor:1.8 GHz dual-core
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9**
  • Hard Drive:3 GB HD space

* Windows Vista users will need to install the DirectX 11 platform update from Microsoft.
** You can use 3DMark to test DirectX 9 and DirectX 10 compatible hardware, but you will need a DirectX 11 compatible video card to run all of the tests. DirectX 9 hardware needs Shader Model 3.0 support, 128MB video card memory and WDDM 1.1 drivers.

mac_requirements.minimum:
macOS Minimum:
  • OS:macOS 14 Sonoma
  • Processor:Apple Silicon M-series SoC
  • Memory:8GB System RAM
  • Storage:2 GB
